attributes.action: Withdrawn or not issue passports to those who are claiming unemployment benefits from the british govenment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Withdraw or not issue passports from all  people claiming unemployment benefits but who still managing to afford holidays abroad paid for by the tax payer.

If hard working, tax paying people can not afford a passport nevermind a holiday how can people on unemployment benefits?

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
